# Chapter 2
## 2.1 Case Study: Predicting Fuel Economy   
Load library and data   
```{r}
library(AppliedPredictiveModeling)
data(FuelEconomy)
```

Structure of the data set   
```{r}
str(cars2010)
```

Build a model FE~EngDispl ?      
Want to build model on 2010cars and test on 2011cars     
```{r}
par(mfrow = c(1,2))
plot(cars2010$EngDispl, cars2010$FE, pch = 19)
plot(cars2011$EngDispl, cars2011$FE, pch = 19)
par(mfrow = c(1,1))
```

Simple linear regression model    
```{r}
lm.model <- lm(cars2010$FE ~ cars2010$EngDispl)
summary(lm.model)
plot(cars2010$EngDispl, cars2010$FE, pch = 19)
abline(lm.model, col = "red", lwd = 2)
```

Diagnose plot   
```{r}
plot(cars2010$FE, lm.model$fitted.values, pch = 19, ylim = c(10,70))
abline(1,1, lty = 2)
```
